wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
http://www.innoq.com/blog/hw/2007/08/14/retire_the_tenets.html
There are better ways of expressing what SO is all about, but the tenets are a start. I agree with some of your statements, but "service orientation is mainstream" isn't among them. "Boundaries are explicit is obvious." To whom? I thing that we (meaning all of us) still have a long way to go.
